prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and a bright blue color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a crocodile with bright colors and an energetic demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments with vibrant scales and friendly behavior.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a blue body with red accents, suitable for water battles.

Design a Pokemon that is both friendly and fierce, with a mix of blue and red hues.
